perturbation.original_text: The object of the Affiliate Program provided by element 5 (hereafter, "Program") is to publish electronic advertisements on the Web site of the Affiliate for selected software products offered by element 5 Software Publishers. Instead of fixed compensation, the Affiliate receives result- dependent Advertising Cost Compensation (also known in the element 5 Control Panel as "Commission") in exchange for publishing the advertisements. The Advertising Cost Compensation depends on the actual sales generated by end users referred via the electronic advertisement (the Affiliate's link).
perturbation.changed_text: The object of the Affiliate Program provided by element 5 (hereafter, "Program") is to publish electronic advertisements on the Web site of the Affiliate for selected software products offered by element 5 Software Publishers. Instead of fixed compensation, the Affiliate receives result- dependent Advertising Cost Reimbursement (also known in the element 5 Control Panel as "Commission") in exchange for publishing the advertisements. The Advertising Cost Compensation depends on the actual sales generated by end users referred via the electronic advertisement (the Affiliate's link).
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Advertising Cost Compensation' is replaced with 'Advertising Cost Reimbursement' in one instance while keeping 'Advertising Cost Compensation' in the same paragraph. This creates confusion as to what the correct terminology is for payment.
perturbation.location: I. Object of the Affiliate Program/ Affiliate Management Program for Software Publishers

perturbation.original_text: Participation of an individual Affiliate in the Program is dependent on activation by the Software Publisher. Once the Affiliate has registered, element 5 will send an e-mail to Software Publisher with a request to activate the Affiliate. Once the Affiliate is activated by the Software Publisher, the Affiliate is considered to be a participant in this program and is bound by these General Terms and Conditions.
perturbation.changed_text: Participation of an individual Affiliate in the Program is dependent on authorization by the Software Publisher. Once the Affiliate has registered, element 5 will send an e-mail to Software Publisher with a request to authorize the Affiliate. Once the Affiliate is activated by the Software Publisher, the Affiliate is considered to be a participant in this program and is bound by these General Terms and Conditions.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'activation' is replaced with 'authorization', leading to uncertainty whether both terms mean the same and what is expected from the Software Publisher.
perturbation.location: II. Affiliate Program ยง 1 Affiliate Participation

perturbation.original_text: (1) element 5 will pay Affiliate its advertising costs (including Vat, if any, on presentation of a valid VAT invoice) if an end user arrives via the link integrated in Affiliate's Web site at the order page hosted by element 5 for the respective Software Publisher's Product under this Agreement and end user uses the automatic ordering system that carries out the registration and payment processing, so that the Affiliate's link is deemed to be directly causative for the entry of the End User into the agreement with the Software Publisher and End User's payment, proving that all requirements are irrevocably met ("agreements arising in a qualified manner"). Affiliate is only eligible to earn the Advertising Cost Compensation on sales occurring during the term of this Agreement and fees earned up to the date termination will remain payable only if the related orders are not cancelled or returned.
perturbation.changed_text: (1) element 5 will pay Affiliate its advertising costs (including Vat, if any, on presentation of a valid VAT invoice) if an end user arrives via the link integrated in Affiliate's Web site at the order page hosted by element 5 for the respective Software Publisher's Product under this Agreement and end user uses the automatic ordering system that carries out the registration and payment processing, so that the Affiliate's link is deemed to be directly causative for the entry of the End User into the agreement with the Software Publisher and End User's payment, proving that all requirements are irrevocably met ("agreements arising in a qualified manner"). Affiliate is only eligible to earn the Referral Cost Compensation on sales occurring during the term of this Agreement and fees earned up to the date termination will remain payable only if the related orders are not cancelled or returned.
perturbation.explanation: Changing Advertising Cost Compensation to Referral Cost Compensation creates ambiguity, as these are two different actions that the Affiliate carries out, thus the Affiliate could argue that they did both and should receive money for both, potentially causing a dispute.
perturbation.location: II. Affiliate Program ยง 6 Advertising Cost Compensation
